text: Emmanuel Ariwachukwu (born 27 December 1993) is a Nigerian international footballer who plays for FK Andijon, as a defender. ==Career== Born in Owerri, he has played club football for Gateway United, Calabar Rovers, Niger Tornadoes, Sheikh Jamal Dhanmondi, Akwa United and Churchill Brothers. In October 2018, he moved to Al-Hilal Club, having previously been vice captain at Akwa United. In January 2019 he spoke about his positive start with Al Hilal. He moved to Naft Maysan later that year, and FK Andijon in 2020.https://www.footballdatabase.eu/en/player/details/337474-emmanuel- ariwachukwu He made his international debut for Nigeria in 2017. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:Nigeria international footballers Category:Gateway United F.C. players Category:Calabar Rovers F.C. players Category:Niger Tornadoes F.C. players Category:Sheikh Jamal Dhanmondi Club players Category:Akwa United F.C. players Category:Churchill Brothers S.C. players Category:Al-Hilal Club (Omdurman) players Category:Naft Maysan FC players Category:FK Andijon players Category:Association football defenders Category:Nigerian expatriate footballers Category:Nigerian expatriate sportspeople in Bangladesh Category:Expatriate footballers in Bangladesh Category:Nigerian expatriate sportspeople in India Category:Expatriate footballers in India Category:Nigerian expatriate sportspeople in Sudan Category:Expatriate footballers in Sudan Category:Nigerian expatriate sportspeople in Iran Category:Expatriate footballers in Iran Category:Nigerian expatriate sportspeople in Uzbekistan Category:Expatriate footballers in Uzbekistan
title: Emmanuel Ariwachukwu
